title: WATCH: Premier League goals and highlights from all 10 matches
description: Watch goals and highlights from the 10 Premier League games, including Swansea's shock win over Liverpool.
content: Anybody in the UK can view the highlights for free, but you will need to create a free Sky iD - you can do that HERE.Alfie Mawson scored the winner as Swansea boosted their survival hopes with a battling 1-0 victory over Liverpool on Monday Night Football.Harry Kane scored his 99th Premier League goal but it was not enough for Tottenham to beat Southampton in a 1-1 draw on Super Sunday.An inspired performance from Eden Hazard helped Chelsea back to winning ways in the Premier League with a comprehensive 4-0 victory against Brighton at the Amex Stadium.Arsenal shrugged off the absence of Alexis Sanchez as they romped to a 4-1 victory over Palace.Anthony Martial's second-half goal gave United a narrow 1-0 victory at Burnley.Oumar Niasse scored within 57 seconds of coming off the bench to rescue a 1-1 draw for Everton against West Brom at Goodison Park.A Jamie Vardy penalty and a late Riyad Mahrez strike were enough to earn Leicester a 2-0 win over Watford.Paul Lambert made the perfect start as Stoke manager as goals from Joe Allen and Mame Biram Diouf secured a 2-0 win over Huddersfield at the bet365 Stadium.Javier Hernandez scored two minutes after Ryan Fraser's opener as West Ham came from behind to draw 1-1 with Bournemouth at the London Stadium.Sergio Aguero's hat-trick helped City beat Newcastle 3-1 at the Etihad to keep Pep Guardiola's side 12 points clear at the top of the Premier League table.
